summary.Title: Tjener Assistent / Server Assistant / Food Runner
summary.JobHeadline: Tjener Assistent / Server Assistant / Food Runner
summary.Presentation:
We're looking for friendly and hospitality focused server assistants to join our team on a part time/casual basis.
About Tigermom

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Tjener Assistent / Server Assistant / Food Runner
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We're looking for friendly and hospitality focused server assistants to join our team on a part time/casual basis.

About Tigermom

We are a creative kitchen offering a set menu served in sharing style. The dishes are inspired from the Asian kitchen, and we are passionate about using organic, seasonal ingredients from local farmers as well as high quality imported goods from Asia. Our restaurant vibe is fun, quirky, lively and friendly. We work with natural wine, locally brewed beer and we make cocktails inspired from good by-products from our kitchen to support our sustainability goals. 

 

Our team

We are passionate chefs and service professionals with backgrounds in some of the world's most highly acclaimed restaurants, and we strive to produce tasty food and an unpretentious dining experience that we're proud of. We are a team from all corners of the globe and we foster a friendly and supportive work environment.

 

Equal opportunities

Tigermom is an equal opportunity employer, which means we do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, marital status, age, nationality, gender, sexual orientation, and the like. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

 

You are​

  • A people-person

  • A fast learner who would like to receive world class hospitality training, or work up to becoming a server

  • Someone with a sense of urgency and who thrives in a fast paced environment

  • Someone with a positive attitude 

 

Your role – server assistant​

  • Providing assistance to servers on the floor

  • Delivering and describing food and beverages to guests at the table

  • Clearing and resetting tables

  • Greeting and serving guests

  • Being a team player and chipping in where you are needed

 

Details

  • Hours are after agreement, but primarily we are looking for staff to work evenings and/or weekends

  • Start date ASAP 

​

What we offer

  • An opportunity to be part of creative, organic and sustainable gastronomy, with Asian flair 

  • An opportunity for professional advancement for the right person 

  • Delicious staff meals provided

  • Best coworkers ever
